name: seX dreamers
description:
Can machines understand human sexuality? Can human sexuality be transformed by machines? This piece tries to show a computational sexuality and raises those previous questions.

Each piece of the Porn-O-topie serie should be conceptualized as an attempt to pass the Turing-Drag test thinking experiment. It is for this reason that the Turing Drag Test thought experiment opens the serie release.

Volumetric GANs, a technique developed by u2p050.
